entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 2:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over southern sections. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then clearing. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
